Hello,
This is my first post on this board, so please excuse any mistakes on 
my part.  I've posted two pictures in the photo files under 
Taipan0723 of a Tsuba I have.  I've been told the mei reads Umetada.  
All of the Umetada School Tsubas I've seen pictures of are non-
pierced.  Any information on this Tsuba would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks in Advance,
Mark
